name: Alarm+
description: An alarm application which makes it near impossible to go back to sleep. You are forced to complete tasks such as: math questions, history questions, and a snake game. The alarm will not turn off until you complete the tasks, turn off the phone or delete the app.
responsibilities: Setup project with angularJS and ionicframework; Designed UI for the Home and Setup page.
Integrated and modified localNotification plugin to use a native android alarm; assigned unique ID to each alarm; used localStorage to store alarms.
Implemented Facebook Integration to allow users to login, logout, and share their successes after completing a task.
Setup karma-jasmine unit testing; contributed to establish test automation with travis-CI.

name: Vibernate 2
description: Vibernate allows users to set multiple schedules for their phone to automatically switch between vibrate/silent and normal ringtone modes.
responsibilities: Implemented the listView page using RecyclerView; verified the functionality of each click event.
Integrated animation on addition, deletion, and scrolling.
